title: Is my account eligible for a PBE account?

replies.body: You don't need to be in a certain tier or division to get accepted into PBE, or even be placed at all.  We don't have a lot of information on how to get accepted into the PBE beyond asking an account to be in good standing per our [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  We can't force applications so through, either.  Best of luck with your application!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=09zni0dX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-05T17:07:10.002+0000)
>
> You don't need to be in a certain tier or division to get accepted into PBE, or even be placed at all.  We don't have a lot of information on how to get accepted into the PBE beyond asking an account to be in good standing per our [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  We can't force applications so through, either.  Best of luck with your application!

Wow. just realized how outdated that post was. It says you can use the rune combiner xD.
Gross!  Here's a link to our up to date [PBE guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  :D  Thanks for that!
